lyrics:
34 contributorstranslationsdeutschportuguês​the perfect pair lyricsverse 1

cause you know were the same theres worse things i can take

verse 2
i know you hate it when theres nothing to say
im not quite sure wеd fix it guess were so usеd to it

wed find it hard to work out why we have all this doubt
